title: Sayakaaja
author: Sayakaaja
content: I feel that lately time has passed very quickly, than in previous years. do you feel that way too?

comments.author: BitcoinBarrel
comments.body: Time appears to move faster as you get older because the more you experience the less exciting new things are. As a child, a simple car ride is a fun new experience. As an adult, you rarely "stop and smell the roses" so you get stuck in routines. These routines make time go by much faster. The key, is to live life with a childlike wonder and appreciate each moment that you are given.

comments.author: Celinena
comments.body: This topic is very interesting, I also have this feeling, the speed of time is faster, a day is very long when I was a child, now the time passes in a blink of an eye, some people say that the earth is ascending, from the third dimension to the fourth dimension.

comments.author: lenexn
comments.body: Time is getting faster and faster. When I was in school, I always wasted time and wasted time. When I entered the society, I always felt that there was not enough time. When I got married, I felt that I couldn't get away from it, and every day was full.

comments.author: Tallupooh
comments.body: i also feel the same way. Even I also feel strange, why time flies so fast.It seems that time on this earth is getting faster.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Time seems to go quite slow or at least at a moderate pace from childhood to early adulthood. I feel like since I hit 30, it just seems to go by way too fast. The weeks pass by like the speed of light. It’s Monday & then before you know it, it’s Thursday & you’re looking forward to the weekend which goes even faster.Try to cherish every day because tomorrow is never promised.

comments.author: Manormon
comments.body: After 30 years, time flies very quickly...

comments.author: Bazzu
comments.body: if I depend on situations and circumstances, when I'm at work I feel that time feels slow, but when I'm off work I feel Time goes fast. so what I feel depends on the situation and conditions.

comments.author: SUNNY F
comments.body: When you open your eyes, it’s dawn, and when you sit for a while, it’s dark, and you have no savings, and half your life has passed, life is meaningless, it’s just an experience.

comments.author: Car22
comments.body: Yes we feel time is passing faster and faster and no one can stop it..

comments.author: kotajikikox
comments.body: Yesterday is Christmas then Valentines and now? Holiweek so what comes next? Yes days are going faster .

comments.author: @sriyan
comments.body: Quote from: Sayakaaja on November 12, 2022, 12:06:30 PMI feel that lately time has passed very quickly, than in previous years. do you feel that way too? I feel the same thing. As we are getting busy with things, we sort of lose the sense of time. However, what matters in the end, is that we reach our goals day by day and we keep improving ourselves.

comments.author: Flydolphine
comments.body: Time absolutely slows down when every things is new for a child i.e(toys,games, parties, vacations,gifts, visitations,travel, amusement parks,game reserves)you see,all these makes the child enjoy the moment and pay less attention to time thereby making time slow and enjoyable for kids.but for older people time seems to be on speed lane mostly because of constant routine schedules, anxiety disorder and stress.Time seems to pass ten times faster for an adult than children.

comments.author: ucranianas solteras
comments.body: From the 30 years old, I have verified how life goes too fast. Since life is short, I try to have the best quality of life that is possible and there are foods that have vitamins that make you age more slowly, Omega 3, Vitamin C, d3+k2 etc... You also have to surround yourself with people who are not toxic, and if you have a sentimental relationship that you are happy with it and have "stability with it". I met ukrainians women, but before the war, and I like them more than western ones because of my way of thinking, which is very similar to theirs. Summary, that perhaps the best people for you "are not close to you" and other times yes.

comments.author: rahulzx
comments.body: Quote from: @sriyan on March 04, 2023, 12:34:48 PMQuote from: Sayakaaja on November 12, 2022, 12:06:30 PMI feel that lately time has passed very quickly, than in previous years. do you feel that way too? I feel the same thing. As we are getting busy with things, we sort of lose the sense of time. However, what matters in the end, is that we reach our goals day by day and we keep improving ourselves.Yep we all experience same thing no; How amazing that all beings defeat by an unseen, untangible dimension.

comments.author: Carlenix
comments.body: I feel that time after 25 years flies very fast.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: As I get older, time does pass by faster than what it really is. There is that daily routine, get up head to work then there is no stopping. With that you just keep going and sometimes it is pass lunch time and you had not taken a moment to give your body to stop and have nutrients. There is that "rat race" lifestyle and living a daily routine life-style we tend to forget to slow down. Slowing down is not something we all can do, but it a lifestyle one can adapt and build upon on. This will help our mind and body as we do not want to be in senior age and have dementia.

comments.author: BADecker
comments.body: One way you can tell that time is speeding up is by how the whole world is heating up. Wars are everywhere. More troubles than ever before.But I just think that it is time friction... aspects of time rubbing against other aspects of time.So, you can tell that time is speeding up by the hot heat that is being generated.

comments.author: Qiubell5
comments.body: Turns out I'm not the only one who feels this. yes, I also feel that time is too fast, so that time to time seems like a flash. I don't know the cause. but, maybe it's just our feelings.
